description: This Java source files defines the EnumProcessor class, which is responsible for processing, analyzing, and managing enum definitions within the context of a code generation framework for ICControl services. The class includes methods for building models from XML definitions, analyzing enums, and generating wrappers used in code templates.

classes.name: EnumProcessor
classes.description: A helper class to process enum definitions within a code generation framework, managing enum wrappers, analysis, and code generation preparation.

methods.name: buildModel
methods.description: Creates an EnumProcessor instance and populates it with enum definitions extracted from the ICService XML definition.

methods.name: analyze
methods.description: Performs analysis on the ICService to set up necessary contextual information; currently a no-op.

methods.name: analyzeAgain
methods.description: Checks each enum wrapper to identify enums not referenced by events or IPC, producing warnings.

methods.name: getWrappers
methods.description: Returns an iterator over the enum wrapper objects managed by this processor.

methods.name: getEnumForDefinitionName
methods.description: Retrieves the EnumDefWrapper for a given enum definition name.
